text: "Animals" is a 2013 song by Martin Garrix. It was taken from his EP Gold Skies. It was released as a digital download. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Scotland and Belgium, number 21 in the United States, number 40 in Canada, number 14 in Italy, number 29 in Slovakia and Australia, number 10 in New Zealand, number 5 in Hungary, Austria and Romania and number 12 in Norway and Denmark. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:Martin Garrix songs
title: Animals (Martin Garrix song)
